name: Nango
description: Get OAuth tokens for APIs - fast & secure

SITE_URL.description: Use https://<your-app-name>.herokuapp.com replacing <your-app-name> with the value above. Or use a custom domain name if you plan to add one to the app later.

SERVER_PORT.description: Port to listen to https requests on

NANGO_SERVER_URL.description: Environment variable for the url where the nango server is deployed on

NANGO_DB_SSL.description: Whether to use SSL to connect to DB. Should be true. Changing to false may have unintended consequences

NANGO_DB_USER.description: Name of the user to connect to the DB

NANGO_DB_PASSWORD.description: Password for the above user to connect to the DB

NANGO_DB_PORT.description: Port on which the DB runs

NANGO_DB_NAME.description: Name of the DB to use
